messages.subject: Northeast Unschooling Conference 2009
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks! I am pleased to announce that there will be a 2009 Northeast Unschooling Conference. It ll take place August 27-30, 2009. Yep, we re adding another
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks!
I am pleased to announce that there will be a 2009 Northeast Unschooling
Conference. It'll take place August 27-30, 2009. Yep, we're adding another day!
We'll also have a brand new location with lots of space and amenities (Huge
health club with Olympic sized pool and tennis courts, free Internet in
conference attendee rooms, and lots more).

I'll have more details for you soon, but I wanted to make sure people got it
into their calendars. The new web site will be up soon, assuming strange
things don't happen.

Kathryn Baptista
